segments.text: I’m focusing on the children and their cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is truly determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, his arm deep inside the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And he’s even holding a plate to catch them, what ingenuity!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands there, palm open, ready for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They have such an adorable little conspiracy going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s surprising how bold they are, with the woman right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks quite dangerous though, I must admit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall while trying to get his prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely pushing their luck with this stunt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how unaware the woman is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a classic childhood mischief moment, captured perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR
